mapper.select: select bid, board.title as title, time, user.name as writer from board left join user on board.writer = user.uid
select bid, board.title as title, time, user.name as writer, description from board left join user on board.writer = user.uid where bid = #{bid}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, description) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{description})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, description = #{description} where bid = #{bid}
